Create Survey UI with CSS and Message Components

survey_ui.Rd

Create Survey UI with CSS and Message Components

Usage

survey_ui(id, theme, primary, mode, cookie_expiration_days, custom_css)

Arguments

id

ID for the survey div container (e.g., "surveyContainer")

theme

Theme name ("defaultV2" or "modern")

primary

Primary color hex code (optional)

mode

Color mode ("light" or "dark")

cookie_expiration_days

Number of days to keep cookies for survey data

custom_css

Optional custom CSS to append to the theme

Value

A tagList containing survey dependencies and container
